media.headline: Gonzalez's RBI double
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Gonzalez smacks RBI double to left field
media.bigblurb: Adrian Gonzalez smacks an RBI double just inside the left-field line to plate the Dodgers' first run of the game

media.headline: Gonzalez scores on error
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Gonzalez scores on error by first baseman
media.bigblurb: Adrian Gonzalez comes home on an error made by first baseman Wil Myers in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Renfroe's solo homer
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Renfroe belts solo home run to left-center
media.bigblurb: Hunter Renfroe crushes an opposite-field home run to left-center field to get the Padres on the board in the 4th inning

media.headline: Puig's solo home run
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Puig launches solo homer to left field
media.bigblurb: Yasiel Puig hammers a solo home run to left field in the bottom of the 4th inning for his first homer of the 2017 season

media.headline: Cahill K's Forsythe to end 5th
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Cahill fans Forsythe to escape trouble
media.bigblurb: Trevor Cahill gets Logan Forsythe swinging to escape a jam with runners on the corners in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Hill fans five in five innings
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hill K's five in five innings, allows one run
media.bigblurb: Rich Hill strikes out five over five innings, allowing just one run on two hits and three walks vs. the Padres

media.headline: Jansen locks down save
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Jansen induces groundout to earn save
media.bigblurb: Kenley Jansen induces a groundout off the bat of Ryan Schimpf to earn the save as the Dodgers win 3-1 vs. the Padres

media.headline: Cahill K's seven in 5 2/3
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Cahill fans seven in 5 2/3 innings
media.bigblurb: Trevor Cahill strikes out seven over 5 2/3 innings, allowing three runs (two earned) on five hits and three walks vs. the Dodgers

media.headline: Turner turns two in the 1st
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Turner starts 5-4-3 double play
media.bigblurb: Justin Turner fields a grounder and starts a 5-4-3 double play to end the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Cahill's first strikeout of 2017
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Cahill fans Toles for first strikeout
media.bigblurb: Trevor Cahill gets Andrew Toles swinging for his first strikeout of the 2017 season

media.headline: Romo induces ground out in 6th
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Romo induces Renfroe to ground out
media.bigblurb: Sergio Romo gets Hunter Renfroe to ground out to third to complete a scoreless inning of work in his Dodgers debut

media.headline: Hill picks off Myers at first
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hill picks off Myers attempting to steal
media.bigblurb: Rich Hill picks off Will Myers attempting to steal second base in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Hill gets Myers swinging
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hill fans Myers for first strikeout
media.bigblurb: Rich Hill gets Will Myers swinging on a nasty breaking ball for his first strikeout of the 2017 season

media.headline: Schimpf turns two in the 4th
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Schimpf starts 5-6-3 double play
media.bigblurb: Ryan Schimpf flips the ball to second base to start a 5-6-3 double play on a ground ball into the shift by Yasmani Grandal

media.headline: Valenzuela part of opening pitch
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Valenzuela's granddaughter tosses first pitch
media.bigblurb: Dodgers legend Fernando Valenzuela catches the ceremonial first pitch from his granddaughter before the Dodgers host the Padres

media.headline: Hill gets hit by pitch on wrist
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hill hit on wrist on his non-pitching hand
media.bigblurb: Rich Hill remains in the game after being hit on his right wrist by a pitch from Trevor Cahill in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Recap: Padres 1, Dodgers 3
media.blurb: 4/5/16: Gonzalez, Puig lead Dodgers to victory
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Rich Hill pitched five solid innings as Adrian Gonzalez and Yasiel Puig lead the Dodgers offense in a 3-1 win vs. the Padres

media.headline: Roberts on Hill's HBP
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hill to have X-rays on wrist after HBP
media.bigblurb: Dave Roberts discusses Rich Hill's prognosis after the starter was struck on the wrist by a pitch

media.headline: Green on loss to Dodgers
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Green on hitting struggles in loss to Dodgers
media.bigblurb: San Diego manager Andy Green breaks down the struggles his team had hitting against Rich Hill and the Dodgers bullpen

media.headline: Roberts talks Puig home run
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Roberts on Puig home run, win over Padres
media.bigblurb: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts discusses Yasiel Puig's home run and maybe moving him up in the lineup following the team's win over the Padres

media.headline: 4/5/17 CG: SD@LAD
media.blurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: SD@LAD
media.bigblurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: SD@LAD
